editor.title: Code Editor for Exercise:
editor.changesErrorTooltip: Submission status could not be retrieved.
editor.unsubmittedChangesTooltip:
There are unsubmitted changes.
You have to submit the saved changes manually.
editor.changesConflictTooltip: Your repository is in a conflict state. Resolve the conflict to continue working.
editor.submitDescription: Stage, commit, push, build and test your changes.
editor.selectFile: Select a file to get started!
editor.fetchingParticipation: Your participation is being loaded, please wait a moment...

conflict.resetRepository: Reset your repository to continue with your participation
conflict.conflictExplanationShort: Resolve the conflict state of your repository.
conflict.conflictExplanationLong: Your repository is in a conflict state. This can happen when you work both locally and in the Artemis online editor. If you are familiar with git, the state of your repository is a merge or checkout conflict. You can click the button below to reset your repository to the last commit.
conflict.conflictWarning: This will delete all uncommitted changes (the changes from your last submit in the online editor)!

refresh.refreshFilesDescription: Refresh all files. This will overwrite all unsaved changes.
refresh.refreshExplanationShort: Refresh and load all files from your repository.
refresh.refreshExplanationLong: You have unsaved or uncommitted changes in the online editor. When you click the button below, these changes will be reset and overwritten with the last commit on the repository server. This can not be undone!

fileBrowser.deleteFileConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the file {{filename}}?
fileBrowser.deleteFolderConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the folder {{filename}} and all its contents?
fileBrowser.renameFolderDisabledTooltip: To rename this folder, deactivate the combining of folders in the toolbar above.

errors.participationNotFound: Your participation could not be found.
errors.exerciseNotFound: The exercise could not be found.
errors.saveFailed: One or more files could not be updated.
errors.commitFailed: One or more files could not be committed.
errors.noPermissions: You don't have the necessary permissions.
errors.checkoutFailed: The checkout of your git repository failed.
errors.fileExists: File/Directory name already exists. Please choose a different name.
errors.unsupportedFile: File with this extension not supported.
errors.fileOperationFailed: File operation could not be executed. Please try again later.
errors.participationCouldNotBeDeleted: Participation could not be deleted and might now be corrupted .
errors.couldNotBeRetrieved: The repository status could not be retrieved.
errors.problemStatementCouldNotBeUpdated: The problem statement of this exercise could not be updated.
errors.failedToLoadBuildLogs: The build logs could not be retrieved.
errors.repositoryInConflict: Your repository has entered a conflict state.
errors.saveFailedInternetDisconnected: Saving failed. Please make sure you have a stable internet connection and try again.
errors.commitFailedInternetDisconnected: Commit failed. Please make sure you have a stable internet connection and try again.
errors.refreshFailedInternetDisconnected: Refresh failed. Please make sure you have a stable internet connection and try again.
errors.resetFailed: Your repository could not be reset.

repoSelect.solutionWarning: The Solution Repository does not fulfill one or more test cases. This could indicate an issue with the Solution Repository.
repoSelect.solutionSuccess: The Solution Repository fulfills all test cases.
repoSelect.solutionInfo: No result found for the Solution Repository.
repoSelect.templateWarning: The Template Repository already fulfills one or more test cases. This could indicate an issue with the Template Repository.
repoSelect.templateSuccess: The Template Repository fulfills no test cases.
repoSelect.templateInfo: No result found for the Template Repository.
repoSelect.exerciseHasNoIssues: No issues were identified in the repositories.
